track.strDescriptionEN: "International Love" is a song by American rapper Pitbull from his sixth studio album, Planet Pit. The song features vocals from American R&B singer Chris Brown. It was written by Pitbull, Soulshock, Peter Biker, Sean Hurley and Claude Kelly, and it was produced by Soulshock, Biker and Hurley. The song was first released on May 27, 2011 as the first promotional single from the album. However, on October 11, 2011 the single started airing on rhythmic radio in the United States, and was finally released as the fourth and final official single on November 1, 2011 when it impacted US mainstream radio. It has so far peaked at number 13 on the Billboard Hot 100 in the United States. The song was included at #39 on Tr3s' Top 100 of 2012.
